attributes.action: commit to meeting with a representative sample of petition signatories when the number exceeds 20,000.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the event that any petition on this web site has more than 20,000 signatories the Prime Minister or his/her representative should agree to meet with a sample of the signatories of the petition to discuss the issue at hand. If an issue relates particularly to a given constituency then the Prime Minister should lobby the member concerned to meet with the appropriate constituents.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
